quotes.message: You can hear a song in every word if you listen closely enough.

quotes.name: Erica Jong

quotes.message: Hide yourself in God, so when a man wants to find you he will have to go there first.

quotes.message: Keep behind, and you shall be put in front; keep out, and you shall be kept in.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu
